ean about "them" using=C2=A0anamolies, fluctuations and variables is simply=

me change or fluctuation=C2=A0in detectable EM fields & energy patterns/sou=
rces, it seems to create EVP's "they" need something just as=C2=A0adjustabl=
e (a medium that can be altered and affected)=C2=A0and/OR need to cause/cre=
ate/make some kind of fluctuation, variation=C2=A0or adjustment in conditio=
ns=C2=A0in order to form a voice. 
=C2=A0
I can't see any other way that wh=
ite noise OR raw audio could possibly be manipulated to form voices if some=
 type of fluctuation, alteration or level of variability wasn't present, al=
ready occuring=C2=A0or made=C2=A0available to them.

well I was just asking cause I =

evice..well I do,but people does say that's not normal lol..I mean i get ev=
p through computers,recorders,my phone memo, or even my kids play recording=

en I'm trying to record something and get not just a moan but sentences..us=
ually asking for help or just letting me know they can see me..
=C2=A0

with saying that I love my boxes and I get amazing results form those to. I=
 was saying not sure if you need "anomalies, fluctuations and variable cond=
itions" that your speaking of...well at least I don't..


--- On Sat, 1/8/1=
1, Mvanah Maloti <inyanga4@...> wrote:


From: Mvanah Maloti <inyanga=
4@...>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Hi everyone..does anyone know anything =
about this device?

011, 10:47 AM


=C2=A0 






It looks like a cool toy, but I'm not sure it=
 would make a whole ton of difference in one's results, it might even detra=
ct from them. Others mileage & opinions may differ, naturally. 
=C2=A0
It s=
eems this device is trying to establish a very=C2=A0loose set of "controls"=
 for capturing and validating EVP, but in my opinion this is the WRONG thin=
g to do in some ways...I think "they" need anomalies, fluctuations and vari=
able conditions for the best communication possible=C2=A0(something box-wor=
k provides them, and abundantly at that!). 
=C2=A0
Since working with the b=
oxes I don't think I could ever go back to white noise EVP and be happy; th=
e sweeping radio is just too effective and light years ahead of what=C2=A0f=
olks were doing even just=C2=A010-12 years (and months!)=C2=A0ago, I feel. =

=C2=A0
Where the sweeping radio functions=C2=A0more like a proper telephon=
e (2 way), traditional EVP just feels like I might as well try=C2=A0tying=
=C2=A0two tin cans together with a string between them and hoping for somet=
hing useful or interesting to=C2=A0be captured or come through. 
=C2=A0
Box=
 work just=C2=A0feels=C2=A0a lot more proactive and effective to me=C2=A0in=
 every way, shape and form. I can't think of a single advantage=C2=A0that c=
lassical EVP recording & research=C2=A0has or could offer one over=C2=A0the=
 boxes. The skeptics are still going to bitch, moan and continue "debunking=
" both EVP and Ghost Box communication=C2=A0either way and that's fine with=
 me, I don't work for them and I'm not trying to convince anybody, lol. 
=
=C2=A0
$135.00 could get me another FLIP!=C2=A0 ;)
=C2=A0
-J
=C2=A0

nd of fluctuation, variation or adjustment in conditions in order=

Align=3Dtop>
<DIV>It looks like a cool toy, but I'm not sure it would make =
a whole ton of difference in one's results, it might even detract from them=
. Others mileage & opinions may differ, naturally. </DIV>
<DIV> </=
DIV>
<DIV>It seems this device is trying to establish a very loose set=
 of "controls" for capturing and validating EVP, but in my opinion this is =
the <U>WRONG</U> thing to do in some ways...I think "they" need anomalies, =
fluctuations and variable conditions for the best communication possible&nb=
sp;(something box-work provides them, and abundantly at that!). </DIV>
<DIV=
> </DIV>
<DIV>Since working with the boxes I don't think I could ever =
go back to white noise EVP and be happy; the sweeping radio is just too eff=
ective and light years ahead of what folks were doing even just 1=
0-12 years (and months!) ago, I feel. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>Wh=
ere the sweeping radio functions more like a proper telephone (2 way),=
 traditional EVP just feels like I might as well try tying two ti=
n cans together with a string between them and hoping for something useful =
or interesting to be captured or come through. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV=
>
<DIV>Box work just feels a lot more proactive and effective to =
me in every way, shape and form. I can't think of a single advantage&n=
bsp;that classical EVP recording & research has or could offer one=
 over the boxes. The skeptics are still going to bitch, moan and conti=
nue "debunking" both EVP and Ghost Box communication either way and th=
at's fine with me, I don't work for them and I'm not trying to convince any=
body, lol. </DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>$135.00 could get me another FLIP!=
  ;)</DIV>
<DIV> </DIV>
<DIV>-J</DIV>
